text: yahee vo log hain, jinapar allaah ne puraskaar kiya, nabiyon mein se, aadam kee santati mein se tatha unamen se, jinhen hamane (naav par) savaar kiya noohî€¼ ke saath tatha ibraaheem aur israeel kee santati mein se tatha unamen se jinhen hamane maargadarshan diya aur chun liya, jab inake samaksh padhee jaatee thee atyant krpaasheel kee aayaten, to ve gir jaaya karate the sajda karate hue tatha rote hue
